data.name: Prisoner of Destiny
data.desc:
Once per Chain, if a Link-4 monster is Link Summoned: You can place 1 counter on this card (max. 3), then you can apply this effect based on the number of counters on this card.
● 1: Declare 1 card name, and if you do, the activated effects and effects on the field of cards with the declared original name are negated this turn.
● 2: Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower monster from your GY.
● 3: Send this card to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Link-4 monster from your Extra Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Prisoner of Destiny" per turn.
